prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodieHeaven
Title: Historical Evolution of Gastronomy: From Ancient Cultures to Molecular Cuisine
Description: Dive into the fascinating journey of gastronomy, tracing its roots from ancient civilizations, exploring the culinary renaissance of the middle ages, and landing into the scientific world of molecular cuisine. A must-read for history buffs and food aficionados.
It really does not peak my interest that much, even though I do love food and history.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PlanetTraveler
Title: A Guide to Sustainable Tourism: Exploring the World Responsibly
Description: Unearth the best practices for sustainable tourism, as we guide you through eco-friendly travel destinations, tips to reduce your carbon footprint, and ways to support local communities during your travels. Ideal for passionate travelers and environmental advocates.
This article sounds very interesting. I would love to find out more about eco-friendly travel destinations.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumMechanics101
Title: Encountering the Uncertainty Principle: A Guide for Beginners
Description: Embark on a journey into the world of quantum mechanics, starting with its most fundamental concept - Heisenberg's uncertainty principle. This introductory level look is perfect for anyone curious about the science of the very small, and the strange laws that govern it.
I am not really interested in mechanics. I wouldn't even know where to begin on this topic.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PsychoHealth
Title: The Impact of Social Media on Mental Health: An In-depth Analysis
Description: This detailed piece examines the profound effects of social media on mental health. Drawing from recent research and real-life experiences, it explores how platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter are influencing our self-worth, interpersonal relationships, and overall mental well-being. A thought-provoking read for anyone interested in understanding the psychological implications of our digital life.
Yes I am very interested in this article. I think social media is having a huge impact on mental health, and especially mental health of our youth. I would love to explor and read about this further.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticPerspectives
Title: The Role of Virtual Reality in Modern Art: Breaking Barriers
Description: This intriguing article delves into the growing influence of technology on the art world, focusing on the use of virtual reality in creating immersive artworks. From digital art exhibitions to VR-enabled installations, discover how artists are leveraging this technology to push the boundaries of creativity and redefine the notion of art. A captivating read for art enthusiasts, tech buffs, and those curious about the intersection of technology and culture.
I am not really interested in modern art so this subject does not interest me.

feedback.feedback_other: Thank you for allowing me to participate in your study.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
